resources.string: Purchase construction materials and pay in installments. Create an account to get started.
By clicking "Create Account" you are agreeing to our Terms of Service. View our Privacy Policy to see how we keep your information safe.
You can either create an account as a customer or a vendor. Select your preferred account to proceed.

A customer account enables you to buy construction materials from different vendors. You can browse products from different vendors. This account enables you to purchase products in installments or on credit.
A vendor account provides you with a shop to sell your products. As a vendor, you can list your products and prices. This platform will help you market your products to potential customers.
